### Technology Stack

**Backend:**
- Python Flask with blueprint architecture
- MariaDB database with InnoDB engine
- SQLite FTS5 planned for advanced search
- bcrypt password hashing with 2FA

**Frontend:**
- HTML/CSS/JavaScript (vanilla)
- Responsive design with card-based layouts
- Real-time temporary link generation
- Ajax-based search and filtering

**Infrastructure:**
- Nginx reverse proxy with SSL/TLS
- Shared session management across domains
- Comprehensive logging and error handling
- Production-ready deployment configuration

---

## Database Architecture

### Complete Schema

**Users Table** - User account management with advanced security
```sql
CREATE TABLE users (
  id int(11) PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  uuid varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  name varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  email varchar(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  organization varchar(255),
  password_hash varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  twofa_photo longblob NOT NULL,
  twofa_photo_hash varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  address varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  city varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  county varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  last_login datetime,
  created_at datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp()
);
```

**Chats Table** - Core conversation storage with user isolation
```sql
CREATE TABLE chats (
  id varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  created_at datetime NOT NULL,
  source varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  content longtext NOT NULL,
  summary text,
  content_hash varchar(64) UNIQUE,
  user_id int(11),
  title varchar(255) DEFAULT 'Untitled Chat',
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
```

**Temp Links Table** - Secure temporary sharing system
```sql
CREATE TABLE temp_links (
  token varchar(255) PRIMARY KEY,
  chat_id varchar(36) NOT NULL,
  expires_at datetime NOT NULL,
  created_at datetime DEFAULT current_timestamp(),
  user_id int(11),
  FOREIGN KEY (chat_id) REFERENCES chats(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCA
